name: Data Analyst
description:
Data Analyst (full/part time)

We’re recruiting! Fulcrum Rocks is looking for a skilled Data Analyst. If you’re passionate, motivated, energetic, and an expert in Data Analysis, then you’re the one we need!

Fulcrum is a team of top-performers. We seek stubborn, enthusiastic, result-oriented ‘die-hards’ to join our team. The best candidate is responsible, organized & has good analytical skills.

As a Data Analyst, you will check the quality of connected analytics, written queries/solved tasks, consult on blockers for the current tasks and, of course, suggest points for the improvements. The project is a loyalty platform for gamers (btw, it’s 100% fun & transparent).

Requirements:

— At least 1 year of experience in data analysis;
— Advanced SQL-skills;
— Practical experience of working with BI-tools (Redash familiarity is strongly preferable);
— Google Analytics Power user who’s able to efficiently use/query GA Core API;
— Cross-platform analytics (Web&Mobile);
— Flexibility (you should be able to go away from standard practices);
— Meeting deadlines (we’re expecting tangible results at the end of each deadline);
— Ability to work under pressure;
— Desire to work in a startup environment;
— Solution/result-oriented — your work should bring results (relevant metrics/dashboards delivered, reports based on analysis performed).

Nice-to-have:

— Experience in building out entire analytical stack from scratch;
— Experience in setting up analytics for desktop apps;
— Proven ability to troubleshoot data collection issues;
— Google Tag Manager familiarity.

What will you do:

— Check the quality of connected analytics (data collection, time spent);
— Check the quality of written queries / solved tasks (whether it could have been done better)
— Consult on blockers for current tasks (limitations on existing data)
— Provide points for improvement

What’s Fulcrum? (super briefly)

— We are a young & professional IT company, based in Kyiv;
— We have 50+ amazing professionals on our team;
— We create advanced products for international markets.

What we offer:

— Full-time position, flexible hours;
— Cozy office with a gorgeous panorama of the city;
— Office close to the KPI metro walking time;
— We are ready to invest in your education & self-development.

About the project:

Buff is an advanced loyalty platform for gamers. It already has 200K+ users monthly & it’s still growing. The platform lets gamers earn just for playing. The development process is extremely dynamic and fun. We always come up with cool ideas for new features. At the same time, the client is a highly responsive and communicative person who we enjoy working with.

Sounds interesting? Then, apply now, don’t wait up. Fulcrum is a cool place to work, where you’ll have fun, make friends, and grow professionally.
